item.description:
"Eat, Drink, & Think Pink!" On Friday, April 3rd from 6:30-10 fundraiser at FELT Boston.

This sounds like a great event and a lot of fun! Join us at Felt! Tickets are available at the door...And, no pressure if you want to come later! Just call or email me and I'll find you when you get there !

There will be a silent auction and raffle, with many great prizes! There will also be an array of hors d'oeuvres, DJ entertainment, and a cash bar!

Janice Wright of Silpada Jewelry will also be present and all profits will go to our fundraising efforts!

Tickets are $10/person in advance or $15/person at the door. All proceeds will benefit the Avon Foundation Breast Cancer Crusade.

To pay in advance, visit the fund raising website:

Donation Site!


and make the appropriate donation (ex. 1 person $10, 2 people $20, etc.).
Be sure to leave a comment indicating that the donation is for the event!
item.how_to_find_us: Email me and I'll send you my #!
item.name: Eat, Drink and Think Pink!
